mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_driver (driver_code, province_id, city_id, area_id, is_delete, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, version) values (#{driverCode}, #{provinceId}, #{cityId}, #{areaId}, 0, #{createId}, now(), #{updateId}, now(), 0)

insert into t_sys_user (user_code, user_account, user_name, password, image_path, phone, idcard, role, is_delete, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, version) values (#{driverCode}, #{driverAccount}, #{driverName}, #{password}, #{imagePath}, #{phone}, #{idCard}, 2, 0, #{createId}, now(), #{updateId}, now(), 0)
mapper.update: update t_sys_driver set province_id = #{provinceId}, city_id = #{cityId}, area_id = #{areaId}, version = version + 1 where driver_code = #{driverCode} and version = #{version}

update t_sys_user set user_account = #{driverAccount}, user_name = #{driverName}, password = #{password}, image_path = #{imagePath}, phone = #{phone}, idcard = #{idCard}, version = version + 1 where user_code = #{driverCode} and version = #{version}

update t_sys_driver set is_delete = 1, update_id = #{userId}, update_time = now(), version = version + 1 where driver_code in
#{item}

update t_sys_user set is_delete = 1, update_id = #{userId}, update_time = now(), version = version + 1 where user_code in
#{item}
mapper.select: select a.driver_code driverCode, b.user_name driverName, b.image_path imagePath, b.phone phone, b.idcard idCard, b.user_account driverAccount, a.province_id provinceId, c.dictionary_name provinceName, a.city_id cityId, d.dictionary_name cityName, a.area_id areaId, e.dictionary_name areaName, a.version version from t_sys_driver a LEFT JOIN t_sys_user b on a.driver_code = b.user_code LEFT JOIN t_sys_dictionary c on a.province_id = c.dictionary_code LEFT JOIN t_sys_dictionary d on a.city_id = d.dictionary_code LEFT JOIN t_sys_dictionary e on a.area_id = e.dictionary_code where a.driver_code = #{driverCode} and a.is_delete = 0

select a.driver_code driverCode, b.user_name driverName, b.phone phone, b.idcard idCard, b.user_account driverAccount from t_sys_driver a, t_sys_user b where a.driver_code = b.user_code and a.is_delete = 0
and a.area_id = (select area_id from t_sys_store where user_code = #{userId})
and a.driver_code like concat('%', #{driverCode}, '%')
and b.user_name like concat('%', #{driverName}, '%')
and a.province_id like concat('%', #{provinceId}, '%')
and a.city_id like concat('%', #{cityId}, '%')
and a.area_id like concat('%', #{areaId}, '%')
